title: Quintessential eSports - Tryouts have begun for 2016 OPL Team - Diamond or above - FINAL CHANCE
body:
Hello Community,

Quintessential eSports has opened applications for its 2016 Pro Team. All roles (**incl coaching**) are open for application on www.qtesports.com. We are doing a rolling recruitment, hence applications will close when all spots have been filled. The number of applications are coming in fast, with some already progressing to further stages and interviews. We would suggest you apply ASAP as we have already begun tryouts for those who have been interviewed. 

The requirements are as follows:

-Diamond +
-OCE (ideally living in Australia)
-Commitment to the team over 2016 season
-Professional attitude
-Proper Hardware and internet Connection (incl. mic and cam)

In return, QTE will provide:
**-Team bonus for making it into the challenger series**
-Reimbursed pro level play 
-Professional and dedicated environment
-Managed daily trainings and dedicated communication channels
-Managed weekly analyst and/or a coach sessions (likely several times a week)
-A Management Team that is committed to helping players reach their full potential
-A professional environment that has a strong support network
-Support players and the team in attaining sponsorship
-Legal framework to ensure a committed team
-Timetabling to maximise team training

The 5 members will be integrated into the team and work together with our management, streamers and sponsors to excel and move towards making a living from playing the game we all love. It will be up to the players to take advantage of the support and management we provide. We want team players with an open mind, this is an absolute requirement.

To streamline the process **_please answer the following questions, in order, in an email to hello@qtesports.com_**

1. Full Name
2. Summoner name
3. Date of Birth
4. Postcode
5. Fluent in English (Y/N)
6. Computer Hardware (incl. mic and cam)
7. Comfortable to use mic (Y/N)
8. Comfortable to be filmed (at events like OCE) and streamed live (Y/N)
9. Internet Connection and stability (ie: Hardwired ADSL2+, do you experience drop outs and if so how long are they for?)
10. Days and times you are available to play and train
11. Any times in which you are 100% unable to play
12. Please list any work or educational commitments
13. Please list any planned holidays or trips away  
14. Role Preference in order of preference (must be at diamond level or higher) 
15. We look forward to hearing from you soon!

Thanks,

QTE Management.

[Website](http://www.qtesports.com)
[Instagram](https://instagram.com/quintessentialesports)
